org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.validation
Class AeErrorReporter

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.validation.AeErrorReporter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeBaseErrorReporter, IAeErrorReporter
public class AeErrorReporter
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeErrorReporter

Definition layer (run-time) error reporter.

Field Detail

mRootDefNode

private AeProcessDef mRootDefNode
Root logical node for this error report.

mErrors

protected java.util.HashMap mErrors
The map of error lists recorded by this instance. Each entry links a logical node model to a List of error codes corresponding to issues related to that node.

mWarnings

protected java.util.HashMap mWarnings
The map of warning lists recorded by this instance. Each entry links a logical node model to a List of warning codes corresponding to issues related to that node.

mInfos

protected java.util.HashMap mInfos
The map of information lists recorded by this instance. Each entry links a logical node model to a List of information codes corresponding to issues related to that node.

public AeErrorReporter()

formatIssue

private java.lang.String formatIssue(java.lang.String aBaseMsg,
                                     java.lang.Object[] aArgs)
Substitue the values in aArgs for the '{n}'s in the base message text.

Parameters:
aBaseMsg - The base message, which may contain '{n}'s.
aArgs - The args used to replace '{n}'s.
Returns:
Formatted message string.

removeIssuesFromMap

private void removeIssuesFromMap(java.lang.Object aKey,
                                 java.util.HashMap aMap)
Remove an issues list entry from a map if it exists.

Parameters:
aKey - The key that identifies the node whose issues should be removed.
aMap - The map to remove from, if found.

removeIssues

public void removeIssues(java.lang.Object aNode)
Description copied from interface: IAeErrorReporter
Remove the issues for a given node. This is for cases when a node is found to be 'not used', etc.

Specified by:
removeIssues in interface IAeErrorReporter
Parameters:
aNode - The node whose issues should be removed.

addIssue

private void addIssue(java.lang.String aCode,
                      java.lang.Object[] aArgs,
                      AeBaseDef aNode,
                      java.util.HashMap aMap)
Generic method to add an error, warning or info entry.

Parameters:
aCode - Error code to set.
aArgs - Object array containing substitution args for '{n}'s.
aNode - Node on which error code is set.
aMap - Map (error, warning or info) in which mapping is added.
